page.title: 07A day in the life of Angie 1
page.content: I get up at eight o'clock but my sister gets up at half past six to go to the grammar school.I go into the living room and I meet my Dad.Then I go and have a wash get dressed and my Mum would have my breakfast ready.I eat it then I feed my rabbit.Once I have done that I wait for the school car. I go into the school and say our prayer then I do my news and maths. We go out for our playtime,come in and I do my english.We have our lunch at half past twelve and Mrs Warnock cooks it.I have a game of tennis.We have only got three pupils in our school so it is hard to play any games but we manage.We do art on a Thursday and it is my favourite lesson.Then we do our homework words.In our afternoon playtime we go up to our little garden and water the flowers.
